comments: He spoon feeds you everything - you do actually learn stuff though - you just do not have to study extra stuff, just study the notes he gives in class and come to the lab and you will ace the class. Shouldn\'t be a 3000 level course, but it is. YAY! A fun guy, he makes his students laugh a lot. Really laid back.
